alert.note: Alert for Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 5:27PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern St. Lucie and northeastern Martin Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 526 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jensen Beach, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walton, Fort Pierce, Stuart, Palm City and Saint Lucie Nuclear Power Plant. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
